title: Power Couple
overview: Seven famous couples stay together in one of the most luxurious villas in the Netherlands. Led by Monica Geuze and Valerio Zeno, they compete with each other, with the ultimate weapon: love! Through exciting and extremely confrontational challenges, they rediscover their own relationship and the relationships of the other couples. Which couple knows each other best? Which couple is the most attuned to each other and can work together the best? Who will be crowned Power Couple 2024?
